name: Null Breach
description:
Lost in a collapsing dimension. It's time runs out. Can you save it from it's demise?

This is a game for Mini Jam 126: Lost, a 72 hour game jam (however I only had 48 hours >.<) Feedback is well appreciated! I'm planning on expanding and keep working on this game.

Gameplay

A 2D Roguelike Platformer. Be fast, precise and spend your time wisely. Can you get all 10 abilities? How long will you be able to survive? Share your highscores in the comments or on Twitter with #NullBreach!

Story

You play as Meex, the creator of this dimension. But something went wrong. Upon entering his newly created world he was horrified to discover that it has fallen apart. There was only void with some scattered landmasses.

This worlds time runs out and Meex is lost in this dimension. Collect Time Orbs and defeat Void Eater to gain more time. Unlock new abilities and save your dimension (actually saving the dimension coming soon).

Controls

Move: A / D | Left Stick / D-Pad
Jump: Space | A
Attack: K / Left Shift / E | X
Crouch: S | Left Stick / D-Pad
Climb: W | Left Stick / D-Pad

Credits

Ability Icons: Nexu(Twitter) (itch)
Void Eater Sprites: Krishna Palacio
Character Base: Tarodev
Font: Racuh
Music: xDeviruchi
Everything else: byXToGo(me obviously)
